title: Poor Gang eThugs Looking for ADC (Oceanic Open Ladder)

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
The Poor Gang eThugs are a semi-competitive team. We are looking to compete in the upcoming Oceanic Open Ladder, and need an ADC to complete our roster. Minimum requirements are Platinum +, must be willing to exchange and take in banter, and committed to playing in a team environment during scheduled sessions. 

If you express interest, please fill out the form below:
In-game name:
Rank:
Role:
Champion Pool in that role:
Availability (days of the week):
Able to exchange banter (Y/N):
Passion for flexing all over other petty Oceanic Teams (Y/N):

If you have any further queries, feel free to add me through the League of Legends Client: TKNS Penguin.
Good luck and stay safe everyone!
*Skype and TeamSpeak 3 is also a pre-requisite, so make sure you have them installed prior to application*

EDIT: We are also looking for substitute members, in particular Support, but other roles are also needed!
